snippet.title: Shock Tactics Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Shock Tactics is a turn-based sci-fi strategy game with squad management, exploration, base building and tactical combat that captures the heat of the battle while maintaining fluid gameplay. It is inspired by the space western style of Firefly, the massive weapons of Warhammer 40k and turn-based games like Jagged Alliance and X-COM. http://shock-tactics-game.com
Facebook: https://facebook.com/PointBlankG4mes
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PointBlankG4mes
